idea-plugin.name: Combine and Copy Files
idea-plugin.description: Combine and Copy multiple files to the clipboard, split by path and relative file name. Ideal for providing better context to LLMs such as OpenAI's ChatGPT and Anthropic's Claude.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version 1.1.0

  • Added relative file paths to the copied file headings for better context
  • Added the "Combine and Copy Files to Clipboard" option to the project view context menu
